bibl.title: Dated Textiles from Mons Claudianus and 'Abu Sha'ar.

Methods of Dating Ancient Textiles of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt and Neighbouring Countries. Proceedings of the 4th Meeting of the Study Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 16-17 April 2005
bibl.author: BENDER JØRGENSEN, Lise

bibl.note: Textiles du Mons Claudianus (du Ier au début du IIIe siècle p.C.) et d'Abou Shaar (IVe siècle p.C. et époque chrétienne plus tardive).
BENDER JØRGENSEN Lise, Dated Textiles from Mons Claudianus and 'Abu Sha'ar.

Antoine DE MOOR and Cäcilia FLUCK, assisted by Susanne MARTINSSEN-VON FALCK (Edd.), Methods of Dating Ancient Textiles of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt and Neighbouring Countries. Proceedings of the 4th Meeting of the Study Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 16-17 April 2005 (Tielt, 2007) pp. 26-35, 11 tabl. coul., 13 figg. coul.
